execution_plan.description: Find categories that have no active products (is_active = true).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS category_id, name AS category_name FROM categories c WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products p WHERE p.category_id = c.id AND p.is_active = true);

execution_plan.description: Find product groups that have no active items (active = 'Y').
execution_plan.query: SELECT gid AS group_id, group_name FROM product_groups g WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM items i WHERE i.group_ref = g.gid AND i.active = 'Y');
